text:
Could any one guide me to write a xslt and xsl-fo scripts for Header & Footer for blank pages?

I am getting it for all the pages except blank pages..? is there any possibilities to get in blank pages?

Please guide me..

Br,
Antony
creator: maria.antony84@ymail.com

text:
If you have questions on FOP, please send them to fop-users@xmlgraphics.apache.org in the future. Thank you!

To your question: Please look at http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/fo.html#fo-blank-pages which has an example.
creator: jeremias@apache.org

text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
